snippet: In Emmanuelle Huynh’s “A Vida Enorme/épisode 1,” disembodied voices, male and female, converse in Portuguese and French; the couple appears later, shirtless, in a restive dance.
abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews United States premiere of dance piece A Vida Enorme/episode 1, choreographed and performed by Emmanuelle Huynh, at Danspace Project as part of Danse: A French-American Festival of Performance and Ideas.
lead_paragraph: In Emmanuelle Huynh’s “A Vida Enorme/épisode 1,” disembodied voices, male and female, converse in Portuguese and French; the couple appears later, shirtless, in a restive dance.

headline.seo: Emmanuelle Huynh Presents Sensuous Show at St. Mark’s Church
